item.title: Ink Airy Velvet
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
Evidently, these ingredients combine to make your summer experience unforgettable for the right reasons, preventing sunburn, dryness, photoaging as well as other unpleasant feelings. Likewise, dark spots are easier to avoid as this sunscreen reinforces broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. All in all, this is truly a must-have that innovates without relinquishing MÃ¡dara's values of transparency and sustainability. Once again, these core resources were consciously extracted from Nordic forests, having the planet's well-being in mind. Finally, this sunscreen offers a great example of how efficient solar protection can also be eco-friendly.

Features of Rilastil Aqua Detergente Viso:

  • The stem cells from northern dragonhead successfully fight solar damage, inhibiting the spread of free radicals. Additionally, they contribute to minimizing pigmentation, in turn boosting collagen formation.
  • Raspberry seed oil eases symptoms of inflammatory skin conditions and helps shield the skin from external threats. Besides containing Vitamin E, this oil concentrates high levels of phytosterols that can help reduce water loss. Therefore, it keeps your complexion hydrated.
  • Zinc Oxide reflects solar rays like a mirror. Without penetrating your complexion, it gives effortless broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection and has solid safety evidence.
  • Last but not least, Glycerin moisturizes deeply, being a natural source of endless benefits. From improving skin's resiliency to enabling the penetration of other ingredients and reducing irritation, it takes center stage as an indispensable element in skincare.

  • Last but not least, Glycerin moisturizes deeply, being a natural source of endless benefits. From improving skin's resiliency to enabling the penetration of other ingredients and reducing irritation, it takes center stage as an indispensable element in skincare.

Makeup for special events: shine uniquely!

A special day requires a special look, and bright makeup will be its highlight. Regardless of whether it is a wedding, a corporate event, or a romantic dinner, the right makeup will help you feel confident and unforgettable. An effective skincare routine starts with an effectiveÂ cleansingÂ routine. Far from being the overly aggressive detergents of yesteryear, todayâs cleansers often have gentle, mild formulas that work well with the specific needs of different skin types, removing impurities and make-up residue without stripping the skin of its natural oils.

Make-up should harmonize with your outfit, hairstyle and accessories.

If youâve been followingÂ Care to BeautyÂ for a while, you that our specialty is French pharmacy skincare. These were the first brands we worked with and we continue to identify with their ethosâfor us, thereâs nothing better than gentle skincare products that focus on resolving skin concerns without disrupting the skin barrier.

If youâre looking to replenish your skincare stash with French pharmacy products at discounted prices, we have offers of up to 50%âtime to stock up on iconic moisturizers likeÂ Avenge Tolerance Control Soothing Skin Recovery Cream, or rich lip balms likeÂ NUKE Rave de Miel Honey Lip Balm Ultra Nourishing and Repairing.

Here atÂ Care to Beauty, weâre sunscreen evangelists: if you use nothing else in your daily skincare routine, use sunscreen. Sunscreen has multiple benefits, ranging from the cosmetic (it helps prevent photoaging and some forms of dark spots and hyperpigmentation) to the health-related (itâs our first line of defense against skin cancer). Between mineral and chemical sunscreens, tinted or untinted, in milky or creamy textures, or even gel-like consistencies, thereâs a world of sunscreen options out there, so we know thereâs one for you.

A special day requires a special look, and bright makeup will be its highlight. Regardless of whether it is a wedding, a corporate event, or a romantic dinner, the right makeup will help you feel confident and unforgettable. An effective skincare routine starts with an effective\u00a0cleansing<\/em>\u00a0routine. Far from being the overly aggressive detergents of yesteryear, today\u2019s cleansers often have gentle, mild formulas that work well with the specific needs of different skin types, removing impurities and make-up residue without stripping the skin of its natural oils.<\/p>

Make-up should harmonize with your outfit, hairstyle and accessories.<\/h3>

If you\u2019ve been following\u00a0Care to Beauty\u00a0for a while, you that our specialty is French pharmacy skincare. These were the first brands we worked with and we continue to identify with their ethos\u2013for us, there\u2019s nothing better than gentle skincare products that focus on resolving skin concerns without disrupting the skin barrier.<\/p>

If you\u2019re looking to replenish your skincare stash with French pharmacy products at discounted prices, we have offers of up to 50%\u2013time to stock up on iconic moisturizers like\u00a0Avenge Tolerance Control Soothing Skin Recovery Cream, or rich lip balms like\u00a0NUKE Rave de Miel Honey Lip Balm Ultra Nourishing and Repairing.<\/p>

Here at\u00a0Care to Beauty, we\u2019re sunscreen evangelists: if you use nothing else in your daily skincare routine, use sunscreen. Sunscreen has multiple benefits, ranging from the cosmetic (it helps prevent photoaging and some forms of dark spots and hyperpigmentation) to the health-related (it\u2019s our first line of defense against skin cancer). Between mineral and chemical sunscreens, tinted or untinted, in milky or creamy textures, or even gel-like consistencies, there\u2019s a world of sunscreen options out there, so we know there\u2019s one for you.<\/p>","scroll_y":"-80"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wd_text_block"},{"id":"e85e726","elType":"widget","settings":{"content_width":"full","text":"Read more","button_collapsible_content":"yes","color":"white","shape":"round","align":"left","icon_type":"image","image":{"url":"http:\/\/dummy.xtemos.com\/woodmart2\/makeup-elementor\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/39\/2024\/10\/chevron-down-black.svg","id":"72","size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"15","height":"15"},"scroll_y":"-80"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wd_button"}],"isInner":""}]

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
A Complete Assortment of Cosmetics, At the Touch of a Finger.

Care to Beauty is all about simplifying your way to beauty and skincare. Wherever you are in the world, we believe you deserve the very best products.

Meet The Team

Each member excels both professionally and personally, contributing their unique talents to create a harmonious and effective work environment.

Cosmetic collections

How We Start Our Business

Become a Member of the Club

With every purchase you make, you'll earn cashback credited to your Woodmart Club account, along with additional perks.

Will be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy

Makeup for special events: shine uniquely!

A special day requires a special look, and bright makeup will be its highlight. Regardless of whether it is a wedding, a corporate event, or a romantic dinner, the right makeup will help you feel confident and unforgettable. An effective skincare routine starts with an effectiveÂ cleansingÂ routine. Far from being the overly aggressive detergents of yesteryear, todayâs cleansers often have gentle, mild formulas that work well with the specific needs of different skin types, removing impurities and make-up residue without stripping the skin of its natural oils.

Make-up should harmonize with your outfit, hairstyle and accessories.

If youâve been followingÂ Care to BeautyÂ for a while, you that our specialty is French pharmacy skincare. These were the first brands we worked with and we continue to identify with their ethosâfor us, thereâs nothing better than gentle skincare products that focus on resolving skin concerns without disrupting the skin barrier.

If youâre looking to replenish your skincare stash with French pharmacy products at discounted prices, we have offers of up to 50%âtime to stock up on iconic moisturizers likeÂ Avenge Tolerance Control Soothing Skin Recovery Cream, or rich lip balms likeÂ NUKE Rave de Miel Honey Lip Balm Ultra Nourishing and Repairing.

Here atÂ Care to Beauty, weâre sunscreen evangelists: if you use nothing else in your daily skincare routine, use sunscreen. Sunscreen has multiple benefits, ranging from the cosmetic (it helps prevent photoaging and some forms of dark spots and hyperpigmentation) to the health-related (itâs our first line of defense against skin cancer). Between mineral and chemical sunscreens, tinted or untinted, in milky or creamy textures, or even gel-like consistencies, thereâs a world of sunscreen options out there, so we know thereâs one for you.

item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
Address

2116 W McCormick St, Wichita, KS 67213, USA

Monday - Tuesday 10.00am - 6.00pm (By Appointment Only)
Wednesday - Saturday, 11.00am â 5.00pm
Sunday, Closed

Phone

(316) 389-7041

Email

info.mail@mail.com

How We Start Our Business

    Makeup for special events: shine uniquely!

    A special day requires a special look, and bright makeup will be its highlight. Regardless of whether it is a wedding, a corporate event, or a romantic dinner, the right makeup will help you feel confident and unforgettable. An effective skincare routine starts with an effectiveÂ cleansingÂ routine. Far from being the overly aggressive detergents of yesteryear, todayâs cleansers often have gentle, mild formulas that work well with the specific needs of different skin types, removing impurities and make-up residue without stripping the skin of its natural oils.

    Make-up should harmonize with your outfit, hairstyle and accessories.

    If youâve been followingÂ Care to BeautyÂ for a while, you that our specialty is French pharmacy skincare. These were the first brands we worked with and we continue to identify with their ethosâfor us, thereâs nothing better than gentle skincare products that focus on resolving skin concerns without disrupting the skin barrier.

    If youâre looking to replenish your skincare stash with French pharmacy products at discounted prices, we have offers of up to 50%âtime to stock up on iconic moisturizers likeÂ Avenge Tolerance Control Soothing Skin Recovery Cream, or rich lip balms likeÂ NUKE Rave de Miel Honey Lip Balm Ultra Nourishing and Repairing.

    Here atÂ Care to Beauty, weâre sunscreen evangelists: if you use nothing else in your daily skincare routine, use sunscreen. Sunscreen has multiple benefits, ranging from the cosmetic (it helps prevent photoaging and some forms of dark spots and hyperpigmentation) to the health-related (itâs our first line of defense against skin cancer). Between mineral and chemical sunscreens, tinted or untinted, in milky or creamy textures, or even gel-like consistencies, thereâs a world of sunscreen options out there, so we know thereâs one for you.

    Read more

item.title: Dermato Clean Hyaluron Cleansing Gel 200ml
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
Evidently, these ingredients combine to make your summer experience unforgettable for the right reasons, preventing sunburn, dryness, photoaging as well as other unpleasant feelings. Likewise, dark spots are easier to avoid as this sunscreen reinforces broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. All in all, this is truly a must-have that innovates without relinquishing MÃ¡dara's values of transparency and sustainability. Once again, these core resources were consciously extracted from Nordic forests, having the planet's well-being in mind. Finally, this sunscreen offers a great example of how efficient solar protection can also be eco-friendly.

Features of Rilastil Aqua Detergente Viso:

  • The stem cells from northern dragonhead successfully fight solar damage, inhibiting the spread of free radicals. Additionally, they contribute to minimizing pigmentation, in turn boosting collagen formation.
  • Raspberry seed oil eases symptoms of inflammatory skin conditions and helps shield the skin from external threats. Besides containing Vitamin E, this oil concentrates high levels of phytosterols that can help reduce water loss. Therefore, it keeps your complexion hydrated.
  • Zinc Oxide reflects solar rays like a mirror. Without penetrating your complexion, it gives effortless broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection and has solid safety evidence.
  • Last but not least, Glycerin moisturizes deeply, being a natural source of endless benefits. From improving skin's resiliency to enabling the penetration of other ingredients and reducing irritation, it takes center stage as an indispensable element in skincare.

item.title: Application method
item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
The power of makeup is undeniable; our favorite products help us create the beauty looks we love, enhance our favorite features, and encapsulate our individual definitions of beauty. The best makeup routines help the modern woman boost her confidence and face the world head onâno matter what the day has in store.

What Is the Correct Order of Makeup?

We know youâve watched countless makeup tutorials online, seen your favorite celebrities get their makeup done with their favorite cosmetics, and you may have even done yours alongside them. But, there are never too many helpful tools and guides to aid you along on your makeup journey!

Liquid foundation

These are water-based solutions that may contain certain vitamins.

Moisturizes

Soothes irritation

That is where we come in with our guide that gives you the steps to apply makeup. Before we give you the 4-1-1 on steps to apply makeup, we want to let you know there really is no set-in-stone correct order. When it comes to following makeup steps in order, you want to remember that you should do what works best for your skill level, your skin.
